Geometry Club

Geometry Club is a series of architecture photographs that are identical in composition, giving us a unique perspective to contrast and compare the differences in form, design, and construction of each facade.

The project lives on Instagram where I encourage people to submit their own photos to be featured. I've featured over 150 contributors' photographs, from more than 30 countries.

I built a Geometry Club camera app with iOS developer Alexander Edge. The app helps you to line up your Geometry Club photos, in real time. It's free and available to download on the App Store.
